Reviews.Title: Good Reciever for Dakota Alert motion sensors
Reviews.Author: Jay D. Anderson
Reviews.Content: This is a well made compact little reciever that records up to 999 triggers with channle, date, and time for up to 4 Dakota Alert motion sensors.  You can configure the frequency and codes and the reciever can tell you exactly what channel has been triggered to tell you where the "bag guy" is.  I have one channel operating looking at the back door of my home.  The device has only one down side... it can "choke" now and then and this requires a "reset" (small hole-button in side you hit with a paperclip).  When you reset it you have to reconfigure date, time, etc. so the logs are correct.  But very useful product... you can set the chime to go and/or vibrate mode.  I clip on my pajama collar in bed on vibrate and it tells me when I have a "fish on the end of my line".  LOL

Reviews.Title: Portable receiver for Dakota motion detector
Reviews.Author: Wilton R. Chiles "geezer game player"
Reviews.Content: I already had the Dakota motion detector. The transmitter is mounted at the entrance to my driveway and the receiver blares away when any person or car passes in front of it. The beauty of the PR3000 is (1)you can carry it on your person and (2) it records the event as to time and date so you know what happened even if you didn't hear the alarm at the time.

Reviews.Title: Portable receiver
Reviews.Author: Michael W. Neustrom "Orion"
Reviews.Content: I've been unhappy with this receiver.  My hope had been to be able to ascertain when someone came up our drive while I was on the far side of the house.  It has only provided that service about half the time.  I haven't been able to count on it and have stopped carrying it around.

Reviews.Title: great idea
Reviews.Author: cfeconline
Reviews.Content: This is a great idea but it has to be within veiwing distance or it won't go off.  If I can see the driveway, I don't need it!  It has a range of only around 150' at best.  I ended up putting it in the house on a windowsill so it would be useful at least in there.  I like that it will record the times that it is tripped so it is an excellent addition instead of a 2nd AC reciever if you need more than one alert.

Reviews.Title: Step Saver
Reviews.Author: John H. Adams "Jussi"
Reviews.Content: Our mail box is located about 300 feet from our rural home and trying to guess when the mail or paper was delivered and ready to be picked up was just that, a guess. Many wasted trips were made. The solution was to place a UT-3000 transmitter at the mailbox wired to a switch on the mail box door. A R-3000 receiver now announces and records when the mail is delivered. Our newspaper deliverer opens and shuts the mailbox door when he delivers the paper so that is announced also. This scheme has been in use for 2-1/2 years and has saved many steps. Lithium batteries in the transmitter last almost a year.

Reviews.Title: good for the deer hunter
Reviews.Author: JP Vic "Bee Guy"
Reviews.Content: I have had good luck with the receiver.  I had an extra sensor that I put on one of the deer trails, and linked it to this receiver.  Now whever a deer comes to the feeder - I get a signal in the house - ~100 yards away.Programing is not too difficult, but I need to reread the manual ever time I change somthing.  Worried that I will loose the charging plug - it seems to keep a charge for 6 weeks or so.  REally small -

Reviews.Title: broke very easily
Reviews.Author: tara
Reviews.Content: I've only had it for a few weeks and the screen cover fell off and now it does not work at all and won't hold a charge.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Julian Popescu
Reviews.Content: The range depends very much on the location but overall it works well. I was hoping it reaches to the bar down the street. I do recommend it (the Dakota, not the bar)

Reviews.Title: Great Range
Reviews.Author: Virginia
Reviews.Content: This receiver works great. I use it at the plant I work at and the range is amazing.I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Poor reception
Reviews.Author: gfh GA
Reviews.Content: Bought this after installing a Dakota driveway alert kit to provide flexible notification of vehicle entering property. It is unreliable. Even when sitting next to base station receiver that one will alert and it will not reliably alert at a distance of 150 feet.

Reviews.Title: Exactly as Described
Reviews.Author: Awickedtruth
Reviews.Content: Product arrived and operated exactly as described...range is over 200 feet with exceptional quality. Would definitely recommend for anyone. Small size is a bonus....

Reviews.Title: Outstanding Little Receiver.
Reviews.Author: J. Parks "The Pirate"
Reviews.Content: It's not quite as sensitive as the base station but good to at least 150 feet. It numbers (1-4) which channel set alarm off. Does not have a automatic charging system so you have to remember to un-plug it in about 7 hrs if it is completely discharged. After a 7 hour charge I left it on 24/7 with both the audible alarm and vibrate on. It ran for 17 days and received over 1100 alarms. I have  transmitters on the driveway, front porch and back deck. My cats run in and out all day long and I always know when one wants in. And because the transmitters are battery powered you can still receive motion alerts in case of a power failure.

Reviews.Title: Nice Companion
Reviews.Author: David Klein "Dave"
Reviews.Content: This is a nice addition to the base station when I'm away and can not hear the audible signal. When I'm in the back yard or work shop and am expecting a visitor it's nice to clip this to my belt and meet them as they drive up to the house.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect. great range
Reviews.Author: dbfull
Reviews.Content: I have this paired with the ir3000 and I love it. Range is great and works perfect.

Reviews.Title: very handy
Reviews.Author: Michael V. Decroff "SASS Madd Mike"
Reviews.Content: This is so handy, I am often all over my property, so I put this in my pocket, and I know when I have someone come in.

Reviews.Title: Portable Receiver for 3000
Reviews.Author: rem
Reviews.Content: Portable Receiver for 3000 Ser . Works great for me ,,answered my questions of what time alarms are set off when i'm gone. Recommend it. Great support from factory too. It is portable if you are in a different location and want to no if and alarm goes off. As support from factory , i didn't have any problems, just related questions about this and other products.. they are very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Good, not perfect
Reviews.Author: groomRN "Erik"
Reviews.Content: I like this product very much.  It works as advertised and is easy to set up.  My only complaints are that it has a limited range, and the volume is not loud enough.  I bought it so I could use it in my shop in the garage, which is just behind my house and about 100 feet from the receiver and transmitter.  The only place it works is in the house, not anywhere else on the grounds.  So I'm a little disappointed, but still would have bought it anyway.

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed!
Reviews.Author: Julie Cottrell
Reviews.Content: Easy instructions, good options.  I selected the door chime (like grandfather clock at midnight chime) and vibrate.  Since it's portable, I can be anywhere in my house and know if someone has come up the drive.  It's JUST what I needed.  Works every time.
